title: Astros' Turnaround Costs Furniture Mogul
teaser: Jim McIngvale promised that if the Astros won 63 games, he's reimburse the first 500 customers to spend more than $6,3000 at his store. They won 70 games. That promise cost McIngvale $4 million.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
